title: LSTM enc-dec with TensorFlow
description: I have been leading a paper reading group with UTMIST on the topic deep learning. We have been reading papers on the latest advancements in deep learning and discussing the implications of the papers. Check out my blog post a demo of a paper we read.

title: Roommate Matching with AWS
description: I have been working on a project that uses AWS to match roommates based on their written descriptions. Check out my project on AWS Hacks that won the hackathon.

title: Evolving Agents with NEAT
description: Hi guys! I have been pretty obsessed with the concept of neuro evolution. Check out my projects on Neuro Evolution of Augmenting Topologies

title: Pendulum Motion Analysis
description: I have been working on a project that uses computer vision to track a pendulum for my PHY180 project. Check out my project on pendulum motion analysis.
